data.text:
@EU_Commission Los que permite el   CIA y el 
Mosad
@EU_Commission Do we fucking care.....
@EU_Commission Amazing what technology can do at the border isn't... but cant do trade, weird that... @JunckerEU @LeoVaradkar @BorisJohnson @MichelBarnier @rtenews @SkyNews @BBCNews
@EU_Commission @KDiakomano 🎁🎁🎁🎁🎁
@EU_Commission How about a mother-father-balance in parental leave? 6 months obligatory paid leave each would pave the way for employers to treat moms and dads more equally.

@EU_Commission Depends how financially advanced the public purse is. But Eu strips cash from public purse to pay the largest quango of over paid delinquents who honestly believe they pay tax. Where to start

@EU_Commission Not enough, paid parental leave should be at least 5 months and 10 days paid paternity - ridiculous, at least 1 month. Nevertheless, it is a start. Hope this gets improved in the next 5 years.

@EU_Commission We dont have to opt-out dirty drinking water or opt-in safe food, so why aren't there strict rules on #data use what's allowed and what's not? All research shows that informed free consent is a myth, so the hint "Go read the #privacy statements" is either cynical or uninformed.

@EU_Commission Can you please regulate websites that have the options to enable all options at once, but not to disable? Meaning having to disable one by one. Happens a lot in Portuguese press. Only activate all option, never deactivate seen.

@EU_Commission I’m be surprised if the figure is as high as 60%. People are not going to read a 1/2 dozen privacy statements a day. Placing the responsibility on ordinary people to police company’s data usage seems strange. We don’t ask people to chose their own seatbelt standard! #enforcement

@EU_Commission .we just CANT read them fully, do you remember that they are most of the time somewhere written-hidden in the 107* ToS pages or using Url refs pointing to other URL refs splitted in other urls refs  ?

*Courtesy of Apple, Microsoft and so on
@EU_Commission Finishing my Erasmus in Portugal just now ♥️🇵🇹
@EU_Commission Ok who has 2 months really which country? I would move out immediately.

@EU_Commission @EU_Social Normalizing #remotework setups or implementing employee friendly #flexiblework policies would also help achieve this. I would like to know what initiatives we have for those if we already have some.
@EU_Commission Who will pay for this?
@EU_Commission EU favours big business.
@EU_Commission Is this really going to be enforced, in an age of zero-hour contracts and freelancing in any job?

@EU_Commission How about 5 months mandatory, full pay parental leave for each parent, to be used in the year following childbirth/adoption? If it's not mandatory workers can be pressured into skipping it.
@EU_Commission Hardly an achievement.
@EU_Commission Its a remarkable achievement and only cost hundreds of billions of Euros.
@EU_Commission @MargSchinas @GOettingerEU @EU_Budget Hallo je good evening sir thanks
@EU_Commission @mariannethyssen @EU_Social Congrats!

@EU_Commission Une très importante décision, l'anniversaire numéro 2 .Est-ce que  il aurai plus des 10si les
gens  type Farage font usurpation partout?
@EU_Commission @StylianidesEU I had a two-year Erasmus 20 years ago! Still having wonderful friends from those years.
@EU_Commission I spent a semester in German medical school courtesy of Erasmus in 1988, 31 years ago... No babies though.
@EU_Commission Nothing done on extortionate charges on land line and broadband providers ripping of customers
@EU_Commission @riverabsurd Yes please.
@EU_Commission This does make it sound like a breeding programme for clever people.
@EU_Commission My son went on a school exchange, aged 10 ..with Erasmus. He had a fab time being in a Turkish school and meeting new friends

@EU_Commission To A Spinelli's vision. Am not Erasmus student but have led Erasmus Programme (12weeks) @cardiffuni #nursing. Had one Welsh student met Finn husband. Invaluable educational & cultural experience. Myself- international student & brief language experiencec at Uni in Milan, Italy
@EU_Commission What about Housing, what about Human rights,what about government corruption
@EU_Commission Yes, and power outlets as well.

@EU_Commission And criminals, human traffickers, thieves, wellfare-tourists, smugglers the the like cheered like never before.

It was NOT worth it...
@EU_Commission @MartiKroci aha 😉
@EU_Commission @kacidama There's two TEMPUS babies in this house, thank you!

@EU_Commission Thanks to #Erasmus I spent amazing 9 months in Bangor, North Wales. Great memories, incredible experience & friendships to cherish. Followed by a PhD in the UK ...happy days (until the EU referendum) #StopBrexit #PeoplesVote
@EU_Commission 'A Little Respect' was my favourite.
@EU_Commission Did Erasmus in Marseille (from @ucddublin) in 97/98. Made friends for life from all over Europe. Also got to work in the Stade Vélodrome for France 98 #memories #accentmarseillais

@EU_Commission It is high time to launch an Erasmus inspired programme to build up the language skills of our teachers in European languages. Replace dégoût by a strong desire shared by our European youth to speak properly European languages.

@EU_Commission Bloody annoying that Switzerland is not a part of it. As a frontalier that is inexcusable. The Swiss are infamously known to get full advantages just for them and Europe does not put its weight to balance things out.
@EU_Commission I’m sure the UK billions in contributions were well worth it👏👏👏 By the way, I get free roaming in 71 countries with my provider. Outward looking and all that.
@EU_Commission Thank goodness for Erasmus
@EU_Commission Best program even for students in Europe. Unforgettable experience with Erasmus!

@EU_Commission I’m German, did Erasmus in 1997/8 in London. Met my husband there, he’s British and we’re still in the UK and have two lovely Erasmus babies. It’s such a brilliant programme and I wouldn’t have been able to study abroad without it (and wouldn’t have my family now).
@EU_Commission I like the ‘Apple model’. Universal Charger,separate cable. (Please no micro USB, it sucks)

@EU_Commission Erasmus was made to Internationalize minds within exchange environment.......
Far right made it ethnic property of the so called "superior pure race" of the chosen one's......
@EU_Commission Absolutely necessary.

@EU_Commission The United Kingdom will not pay , Our position is very clear #HardBrexit British & Commonwealth (Past, Present and Future) our choice is @BorisJohnson to be prime minister #ConnectCommonwealth @commonwealthsec
@EU_Commission Yes, its obvious!
@EU_Commission Yes.
@EU_Commission How can "we", with such a huge span of general costs?
@EU_Commission most of the sperm get lost in mouth or asses
@EU_Commission I have two bilingual Erasmus kids.
@EU_Commission Having 2 kids being denied access due to the insanity of #Brexit

@EU_Commission Sure, 25% unemployment rate in Spain thanks in part to your austerity shit. 
Go tell lies to hell, assholes.
@EU_Commission Great initiative but how much it costs yearly all costs considered and who pays for it?

@EU_Commission Hubby came on forerunner exchange to Glasgow Medical School - fell in love with Scotland (as well as me) & settled here once he graduated. 
He spent 33 yrs as a Dr in #NHSScotland, benefitting Scottish patients, and our son studied for a year in Berlin via #Erasmus #EUFamily
@EU_Commission But Iceland is not part of the EU.

@EU_Commission I'm Greek, husband Italian, met during Erasmus in the @UofGlasgow. The best decision! One of the best periods of my life, lifelong friendships made and huge help for my career. It literally opens the world to you in so many ways, Erasmus rocks!
@EU_Commission @STWorg It's not that simple!
@EU_Commission Great programme. Should be rolled out to high schools.

@EU_Commission Freedom and democracy???? THAT WENT OUT OF THE WINDOW WITH IMMIGRATION  AND BREXIT TRAITORS. SCRAP THE HOUSE OF LORDS TO SAVE THE UK FROM MORE  IDIODIC DECISIONS AGAINST THE POORER PEOPLE.

@EU_Commission UK young (and less young) people (as the scheme expands to more) will miss out as the UK leaves the EU. Back to restricted opportunities. Back to preferential choices for the wealthy only.

@EU_Commission "should be able"  BLAH, BLAH, BLAH, 
WHO IS IT UP TO? 
YOU LEAVE IT UP TO THE 'INVISIBLE HAND', 
BUT IT IS YOUR DUTY AND YOUR FAILURE, 
AS THE CORPORATE MAFIA THAT YOU ARE.
@EU_Commission Loved every moment of ERASMUS!
@EU_Commission It's nothing to to with the EU....
@EU_Commission How about to talk about harassment against gay people now
@EU_Commission So? What about the ordinary ppl?

@EU_Commission I didn’t do Erasmus, but I did study a masters at a Flemish university, for a fraction of the UK cost. It was a wonderful experience during which I made lifelong international friends. Everyone should have this opportunity. #stopbrexit

@EU_Commission I have two Erasmus babies. I’m Irish, wife is British, met in Lyon, France. Now live in the UK. Despite BREXIT we very much consider ourselves citizens of Europe. Gladly I can get the kids Irish passports. No such luck with the wife as she has never lived in Ireland. 😔
@EU_Commission Fb   Reb
@EU_Commission Happy Birthday 🥳 #Erasmus. Had the time of my life studying in Palermo in 1994. Friends met there and married and have 2 lovely children @hsmans @EU_Commission

@EU_Commission In 1984 I was an ERASMUS guineapig & it changed my life. It's changed the lives of so many millions since it started officially in 1987.A totally brilliant institution. It's created a true Europe of people: fellow students, colleagues, friends, lovers, families.Long live Erasmus!
@EU_Commission Sounds like an social experiment.
@EU_Commission Makes me a proud European
@EU_Commission Now
@EU_Commission #noconfidencevote Worst Commission ever in the history of #EU #shame #Stop
@EU_Commission Remember this. The uk would do well to heed. We don’t want an Irish UK hard border.
@EU_Commission I did Erasmus in 1989. It was great. I voted Brexit.
@EU_Commission Also stop woke bullshit now or coming next election eurosceptics will have parliamentary majority. Does not work in States will not work in Europe.
@EU_Commission Most women on the internet are men and his name is Chuck
@EU_Commission More likely than being harassed offline, or more likely than people who are not women? This is an important issue, and I sympathise with your motivation. Please explain.
@EU_Commission The EU is a force for good in the world. Hence, the British don't want to take any part in it.
@EU_Commission Wow
@EU_Commission Criminals and terrorists pass between member 'states' with ease.  Well done #eu for making the world a safer place. 🙄 #brexit

@EU_Commission I think you should check if it is possible from a Romanian number, i live in Romania and I have @vodafoneRO i was in Greece and it did not work! I do not think that things work in the same way in Romania as in another countries in EU!
@EU_Commission Best year of my entire life. I wouldn't make it without #EU

@EU_Commission Thanks to Shengen Puigdemont is free for Europe
and has not been extradited by our partners as requested.

@EU_Commission Erasmus dual nationality family here. We both came from working class families so were working together in the student bar to pay our living expenses. Together for 23 years years, married for 19 years, two nearly grown up children.
